entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
